posts.post_title: SGC 4 Red chance/ Sheckard Hindu A FT
posts.post_content:
Have a nice Authentic Sheckard and a SGC 4 Chance Red port for trade. Would be open to selling but prefer to trade. Looking for tough common cub off backs. Feel free to reach out at my email [url]kaufmannb14@gmail.com[/url] or text me 219-218-8414.

Thanks

Bump! Chance is still available the hindu has sold. Ideally would like a broad leaf, uzit, carolina brights, hindu, etc as part of cash/trade.

Feel free to message.
